title: SkinX: Acne, Eczema, Psoriasis
description:
Living with acne, eczema or psoriasis doesn’t have to be confusing. SkinX shows you how. One programme to help tackle your acne, eczema or psoriasis, improve your brain health and regain control.  

For too long, dermatology care has been unpredictable, confusing, and impersonal. Of course, that’s without mentioning the various miracle cures, and treatments found online.

It’s time to tackle your skin the scientific way. 

Created by doctors that are lifelong sufferers, SkinX gives you the tools to tackle your acne, eczema or psoriasis, in 3 simple steps:

1. UNLOCK YOUR PROGRAMME

Receive your bespoke 8-week programme, tailored to maximise improvements in your skin, mindset, and control.

2. HIT YOUR DAILY GOAL

We’ll recommend sessions that give you a 360 view of your skin, improve your brain health using behavioural therapy and access groundbreaking acne, eczema, and psoriasis busting techniques.

3. BOOST YOUR SKIN SCORE

See your skin health skyrocket. The improvement in self-confidence and your smile returning is a bonus.

The best bit? It’s all 100% backed by the evidence. Over 250+ academic papers worth. Research has shown to improve symptoms by 48% and enhance our quality of life by 78%. Nonsense, no more.

Plus, you can enjoy all of these fantastic features:

- Comprehensive Tracking - Keep a diary of your symptoms, affected body areas and triggers in less than 30 seconds.
- Personal Coaching - Access to our expert Skin Coaches for support and guidance at any time.
- Itch-Scratch Programme - Groundbreaking tools to discover your itching habits and behavioural therapy techniques to reverse them.
- Skincare Routine - Track all of your skincare products, get reminders and find out the best for your skin. 
- Skin Shield - The innovative Skin Shield uses our state-of-the-art algorithm to show your skin protection.
- Threat Level - Stay one step ahead of the weather with detailed forecasts to discover your environmental triggers. 
- Photo Journalling - Keep track of your symptoms with our privacy-first imaging technology.
- Guided CBT Sessions - Audio sessions for every scenario from when you’re itching to whenever you’re in need of a confidence boost.
- Reflections - Guided reflective sessions to help re-wire your brain patterns and elevate your mindset.

When you become part of SkinX, you’re not just downloading an app to tackle your skin; you're becoming a part of a movement. By taking part, you're anonymously contributing to the largest skin research project on the planet - The Skin Disease Eradication Mission. 

Together, we’ll make acne, eczema and psoriasis a thing of the past. 

Join The Mission Now.

Privacy Policy:  https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/14842373/full-legal

Terms and Conditions: https://www.iubenda.com/terms-and-conditions/14842373

EULA: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Medical Disclaimer: 

This Service does not offer medical advice and is not a medical device. Any content accessed through the Service is for informational purposes only and is not intended to cover all possible uses, directions, precautions, drug interactions, or adverse effects. The Service should not be used during a medical emergency or for diagnosing or treating any medical condition.

Please consult your doctor or other qualified health care provider if you have any questions about a medical condition or before taking any drug, changing your diet, or commencing or discontinuing any course of treatment. Do not ignore or delay obtaining professional medical advice because of information accessed through the Service. Call 999 or your doctor for all medical emergencies.
